reviews.review: Very fun! Game Modes, Fun Servers, PVP, PVBots whatever you want.

8,5/10

while this game is not very realistic, it is still enough to be fun.

i recommend it.

(at least it's better than cs:go)
Very good game until your friends get better at it then you, 9/10.

Exeptional game.Source engine is perfect(even today),and looks amazing.Also,it doesn't require a good PC,so people like me can play in stable 120FPS on very high settings and highest resolution...Easy to play even for people without experience with CS series.Kind of NOOB friendly game,which is exeption among CS:GO and CS 1.6.In my opinion-best PC game ever.I know that very few people think that way,but I cannot forget lovely old days when me and bro played this(and many more games,but especially CS:S)game from morning until evening.Beautiful nostalgic game.But only problem is the price.I recommend buying it only on sales as well as other older games.I could download it from pir@te sites,but I love having it in my Steam Library.
I can advise the game, at least the shkoloty are smaller here, as well as the donation dump
